/* USE : VerManageMapper.getList */
SELECT tcpv.VER_SER_NO, tcpv.VER_SER_NM, tcpv.FILE_DESC, tcpv.FILE_SIZE, tcpv.FILE_DIR, tcpv.PROG_FG, tcpv.PGM_YN, tcpv.DB_YN, tcpv.IMG_YN, tcpv.USE_YN, tcpv.REG_DT, tcpv.REG_ID, tcpv.MOD_DT, tcpv.MOD_ID, tcpvs.REG_CNT, tcpvs.RECV_CNT, tcpv.ORGN_CDS, tcn.NMCODE_NM AS PROG_DETAIL_FG
FROM TB_CM_POS_VERSN tcpv, ( SELECT VER_SER_NO, NVL(SUM(DECODE(VER_RECV_FG, '1', 1, '2', 1, 0)), 0) REG_CNT, NVL(SUM(DECODE(VER_RECV_FG, '2', 1, 0)), 0) RECV_CNT FROM TB_CM_POS_VERSN_STORE
WHERE STORE_CD IN (SELECT tms.STORE_CD FROM TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD =#{hqOfficeCd})
GROUP BY VER_SER_NO ) tcpvs, ( SELECT NMCODE_NM, nmcode_cd FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD ='405' ) tcn
WHERE tcpvs.VER_SER_NO = tcpv.VER_SER_NO
WHERE tcpvs.VER_SER_NO (+)= tcpv.VER_SER_NO
AND tcpv.VER_SER_NO LIKE '%' || #{verSerNo} || '%'
AND tcpv.VER_SER_NM LIKE '%' || #{verSerNm} || '%'
AND tcpv.FILE_DESC = #{fileDesc}
AND tcpv.PROG_FG = #{progFg}
AND tcn.NMCODE_CD (+)= tcpv.PROG_DETAIL_FG ORDER BY tcpv.REG_DT DESC

/* USE : VerManageMapper.dtlInfo */ SELECT tcpv.VER_SER_NO, tcpv.VER_SER_NM, tcpv.FILE_DIR, tcpv.FILE_NM, tcpv.FILE_EXT, tcpv.FILE_NM || '.' || FILE_EXT AS FILE_TOT_NM, tcpv.FILE_SIZE, tcpv.FILE_MIME_TYPE, tcpv.FILE_ORG_NM, tcpv.FILE_DESC, tcpv.PROG_FG, tcpv.PGM_YN, tcpv.DB_YN, tcpv.IMG_YN, tcpv.DEL_YN, tcpv.USE_YN, tcpv.REG_DT, tcpv.REG_ID, tcpv.ORGN_CDS, tcpv.PROG_DETAIL_FG, tcpv.SYSTEM_TYPE_FG FROM TB_CM_POS_VERSN tcpv WHERE tcpv.VER_SER_NO = #{verSerNo} AND tcpv.DEL_YN = 'N'

/* USE : VerManageMapper.verRegist */
INSERT INTO TB_CM_POS_VERSN ( VER_SER_NO, VER_SER_NM, FILE_DIR, FILE_NM, FILE_EXT, FILE_SIZE, FILE_MIME_TYPE, FILE_ORG_NM, FILE_DESC, PROG_FG, PGM_YN, DB_YN, IMG_YN, DEL_YN, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, ORGN_CDS, PROG_DETAIL_FG, SYSTEM_TYPE_FG ) VALUES ( #{verSerNo}, #{verSerNm}, #{fileDir}, #{fileNm}, #{fileExt}, #{fileSize}, #{fileMimeType}, #{fileOrgNm}, #{fileDesc}, #{progFg}, #{pgmYn}, #{dbYn}, #{imgYn}, #{delYn}, #{useYn}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId}, #{orgnCds}, #{progDetailFg}, #{systemTypeFg} )

/* USE : VerManageMapper.storeList */ SELECT tcpvs.VER_SER_NO, tcpvs.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tms.SYS_STAT_FG, tms.CLS_FG, tcpvs.VER_RECV_FG, tcpvs.VER_RECV_DT, tcpvs.POS_IP, tcpvs.REG_DT, tcpvs.REG_ID, tcpvs.MOD_DT, tcpvs.MOD_ID
FROM TB_CM_POS_VERSN_STORE tcpvs, TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tms.STORE_CD = tcpvs.STORE_CD AND tcpvs.VER_SER_NO = #{verSerNo}

/* USE : VerManageMapper.srchStoreList */ SELECT tms.STORE_CD, tms.SYS_STAT_FG, tms.VAN_CD, tms.CLS_FG, tms.STORE_NM, tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD, tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM, tcp.LAST_VER_SER_NO, tmp.POS_CNT, NVL(tcpvs.DIFF_VER_CNT, 0) AS DIFF_VER_CNT, tms.ADDR FROM TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_HQ_OFFICE tho, ( SELECT STORE_CD, MAX(VER_SER_NO) AS LAST_VER_SER_NO FROM TB_CM_POS_VERSN_STORE GROUP BY STORE_CD ) tcp, ( SELECT A.STORE_CD, COUNT(A.VER_SER_NO) AS DIFF_VER_CNT FROM ( SELECT tcpvs.STORE_CD, tcpvs.VER_SER_NO, tcpv.PROG_FG FROM TB_CM_POS_VERSN_STORE tcpvs, TB_CM_POS_VERSN tcpv WHERE 1=1 AND tcpv.VER_SER_NO (+)= tcpvs.VER_SER_NO GROUP BY tcpvs.STORE_CD, tcpvs.VER_SER_NO, tcpv.PROG_FG ) A WHERE A.PROG_FG != #{progFg} GROUP BY A.STORE_CD ) tcpvs, ( SELECT STORE_CD, COUNT(POS_NO) AS POS_CNT FROM TB_MS_POS WHERE USE_YN ='Y' GROUP by STORE_CD ) tmp
,( SELECT STORE_CD FROM TB_MS_STORE_ENVST WHERE ENVST_CD = '1014' AND ENVST_VAL = #{progFg} )tmse
WHERE tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tmp.STORE_CD = tms.STORE_CD
AND tms.STORE_CD IN (SELECT STORE_CD FROM TB_CM_POS_VERSN_STORE WHERE VER_SER_NO = #{verSerNo} )
AND tms.STORE_CD NOT IN (SELECT STORE_CD FROM TB_CM_POS_VERSN_STORE WHERE VER_SER_NO = #{verSerNo} ) AND tmse.STORE_CD = tms.STORE_CD
AND tcp.STORE_CD (+)= tms.STORE_CD AND tcpvs.STORE_CD (+)= tms.STORE_CD
AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd}
AND tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM LIKE '%'|| #{hqOfficeNm} ||'%'
AND tms.AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd}
AND tms.STORE_CD LIKE '%'|| #{storeCd}||'%'
AND tms.STORE_CD IN (${storeCdQuery})
AND tms.STORE_NM LIKE '%'|| #{storeNm} ||'%'
AND tms.SYS_STAT_FG = #{sysStatFg}
AND tms.ADDR LIKE '%'|| #{addr} ||'%'
ORDER BY HQ_OFFICE_CD, STORE_CD
